text: Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion

Everyone, great job on wrapping up!
Seems like the broadcast was well-received...!

We've been getting positive reactions on SNS too...
It's like exploring another potential side of L'Antica!
Ah, it's all thanks to everyone's hard work in acting.

...But exploring another potential side of L'Antica?
The roles aren't that different from how you are...

True. We'd pretty much would say the same things
even in casual conversation.

Some parts were based on our input,
while others were entrusted to the scriptwriters.

Exactly!
It may not even be acting at all, huh?

Of course, there were differences...
But overall, it was like, "Oh, that's Mitsumine!"

Fufu, yeah.
It felt like us, but not entirely us.
It left me feeling something I can't put into words.
Either way, we did it without any setbacks.
Isn't that great?

"Le Moment" is a mysterious...
yet warm place.

When we're all together...
anywhere becomes like L'Antica...

Everyone~! It's done~!
Espuma shaved ice~!!

I'm not sure if it tastes the same as during tjhe shoot...
but let's be sure to enjoy it!
Fufu~ Kogane's still the same.
Fue? Whatcha talkin' about~?

She means you being the manager of "Le Moment"...
...Oh, so this is the rumored espuma...!
Let's dig in──!!
